Package ch.pschatzmann.stocks.strategy.selection

Selection of Best Stocks
Author:
pschatzmann
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IStategySelector  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Restartable
    Functionality to save and load the current data so that we can implement functionality which is restartable.
    SelectionResult
    Result of a stock selection and evaluation run.
    SelectionState
    State object which privides the information for which stock and strategy.
    StockSelector
    Determines the best n stocks out of a collection.
    StrategySelector  
    StrategySelectorOptimized  
    TopNSet<E>
    Collection which collects the top n elements Implemented as TreeSet
